title: ERC827Token's method `transfer` not properly overridden

body:
My issue was solved, although I still need to understand `web3`'s tricky way of forcing the inclusion of an extra parameter.

I updated both branches of my repository accordingly:
- `master` [(here)](https://github.com/carloschida/oz-workspace/tree/master) stays as intended to reproduce the issue and/or future reference.
- `resolution` [(here)](https://github.com/carloschida/oz-workspace/tree/resolution) was added to show the resolution of the problem in `TutorialToken.sol`.

Thank you, once again, @vidorge!

I leave the issue open though should anyone be so kind to comment a bit on:
- why both functions must contains the desired logic;
- why `web3` forces a contract's methods to be called with that extra parameter;
- what `_to.call(_data)` does and whether it is needed in the overriding.
